ManSection.Description:
This function builds the manual of the &RCWA; package in the file formats &LaTeX;, DVI, Postscript, PDF, HTML and ASCII text.
This is done using the &GAPDoc; package by Frank Lübeck and Max Neunhöffer.

Performs tests of the &RCWA; package.
The arguments test1, test2, ..., if present, are names of tests.
Available tests are:
"integral"
Computations with rcwa mappings of the ring of integers and groups generated by them.
"semilocal"
Computations with rcwa mappings of semilocalizations of the ring of integers and groups generated by them.
"modular"
Computations with rcwa mappings of polynomial rings in one variable over some finite field and groups generated by them.
"all"
All tests.
The default (if no argument is given) is "all". In case that all tests are to be performed, the function makes use of an adaptation of the test file tst/testall.g of the &GAP; library to this package.
